long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Title: YT Video Looper

Description:

Elevate your YouTube viewing experience with YT Video Looper - a simple yet powerful Chrome extension that lets you seamlessly loop your favorite parts of any YouTube video. Whether it's a catchy music section, an educational segment, or just a funny clip, YT Video Looper ensures you won't miss a beat.

Key Features:

Custom Loop Points: Easily set the start and end times for the loop, right down to the second, ensuring you loop exactly what you want.
Loop Count Control: Decide how many times the loop repeats, from infinite loops to a specific number of repetitions.
Real-time Activation: The loop starts as soon as you set it, no need to reload or restart the video.
Tab-Specific Settings: Set different loops on multiple YouTube tabs - each video loops independently based on your set parameters in each tab.
User-Friendly Interface: A minimalist and intuitive design makes setting up your loop quick and hassle-free.
How It Works:

Open any YouTube video.
Click on the YT Video Looper icon in your Chrome toolbar to open the popup interface.
Set your desired start and end times for the loop, and choose how many times you want it to repeat.
Hit 'Set Loop' and watch as your video seamlessly loops the specified section.
Perfect for music enthusiasts, language learners, educators, or anyone who loves rewatching parts of videos, YT Video Looper is your go-to tool for an enhanced, repetitive viewing experience.

Get YT Video Looper now and enjoy YouTube like never before!
